p: Arthralgia: This symptom is present in intubated-ICU patients (10.1%), non-intubated-ICU patients (10.3%), non-ICU patients (10.2%), and healthy subjects (1.3%). It is increased in all 3 patient groups compared to healthy subjects (p < 0.01) and is very mild compared to all symptoms in all patient groups. There is no significant difference between the 3 patient groups in this symptom (p > 0.01).
